Create a unique digital profile: Create a unique digital profile for your pet. Centralize all their essential information—such as medical data, contact details, and unique characteristics—in one place. It's your best tool to ensure their quick recovery if they get lost.
we have been working for animal welfare.
We are a Costa Rican family business tha: We are a Costa Rican family business that was born out of a genuine need and the creative vision of a couple who saw a problem and committed themselves to creating new possibilities.
We have had to live through the experien: We have had to live through the experience of losing our pets, as well as seeing loved ones suffer from the same situation. We feel that inexplicable mix of emotions: anguish, uncertainty, despair.
We could not accept that in 2021, pet id: We could not accept that in 2021, pet identification continued to be scarce, tedious, and subject to expiration dates, leaving our companions vulnerable. life.
We clearly saw that more comprehensive,: We clearly saw that more comprehensive, up-to-date, and permanent pet identification was not only possible but absolutely necessary. With technology as our ally, we could provide a real and effective solution.
This is how our commitment was born: to: This is how our commitment was born: to revolutionize the way we protect our pets, making their safety accessible, modern, and permanent.
We began to assemble the small but might: We began to assemble the small but mighty team that, to this day, remains the heart of our company. We dedicated months of intense work, research, and development to launch
Thanks to the beautiful community that t: Thanks to the beautiful community that trusted us from the very beginning, we have been able to grow and expand our services. Today, we are proud to offer a complete app that goes beyond pet identification, providing comprehensive care solutions.
We have many challenges ahead of us and: We have many challenges ahead of us and we are eager to overcome them. We continue to innovate, grow, and improve in order to offer you the best solutions for the well-being of your pets.
Will you join us on this journey?: Will you join us on this journey?
Together, lets make sure no pet gets los: Together, let's make sure no pet gets lost and that they all have the protection they deserve.
Our purpose is to care for and protect p: Our purpose is to care for and protect pets.
Costa Rican family business with rooted: Costa Rican family business with rooted values.
We grew thanks to the trust of thousands: We grew thanks to the trust of thousands of families.
